S08n659:3: anatikramaṇīyo'yaṃ kalparājā mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya mantratantrābhiṣekamaṇḍalavidhāna nica japahomaniyamavidyāsādhanapravṛttānāmasmiṃ kalpavare vidyādharāṇāṃ tithinakṣatracaritagaṇitāmabhijñānāṃ nakṣatra bhavadbhiḥ vighnaṃ kartavyam |
S08n659:4: pravṛttānāṃ śāsane'smin sarvaiśca devasaṅghaiḥ tatra rakṣā kāryā |
S08n659:10: atha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ sarvatathāgatoṣṇīṣābhyunnataṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma sarvaduṣṭanivāraṇārtthaṃ sarvasattvānām |
S08n659:11: samanantarasamāpannasya bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ sarve ca te tathāgatāḥ daśadiglokadhātuvyavasthitā bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniḥ tathāgataṃ śuddhāvāsabhavanasyaṃ vyalokyopasaṅkramante |
S08n659:12: upasaṅkramya acintyabuddhasvakādhiṣṭhānena bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamāmantrayate sma ||
S08n659:13: bhāṣa bhāṣa bho mahāvīra ! lokānāṃ ca hitodayam |
S08n659:16: ekākṣaraḥ pravaro hyagro naṣṭe kāle kalau yuge ||
S08n659:20: vighnāḥ sarve tathā loke ye cānye duṣṭacetasā ||
S08n659:21: anugrahārtthaṃ tu sattvānāṃ jāpināṃ ca sukhodayām |
S08n659:26: atha teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ sannipātā sarvaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātavaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ ca lokabhājanāni ekajvālībhūtāni,
S08n659:29: atha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ sarvaṃ taṃ śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya,
S08n659:30: tāṃśca bodhisattvānmahāsattvān tatrasthitāni ca devaputrāṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhāṃśca bhagavataḥ mahāparṣatsannipātānāmantrayate sma ||
S08n659:31: samanvāharantu buddhā ! bhagavantaḥ ! sarvapratyekabuddhāryaśrāvakāḥ kalpamekākṣarasya vidyācakravartinaḥ sarvatathāgatoṣṇīṣāṇāṃ uparyuparivartamānasyāpratihataśāsanasyāparimitabalaparākramasya bhagavataḥ uṣṇīṣarājacakravartinaḥ punarapi kalpaṃ bhāṣe'ham asmiṃ kāle kalau yuge ||
S08n659:32: atha bhagavato duratikramaśāsanasya trailokyaguroḥ sarvadevanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragasatkṛtasya sarvakarmārthasādhakasya mantre vakṣye punarapi kalau yuge kāle śāsanāntarddhānakāle samaye śāsanārakṣako bhagavāṃ uṣṇīṣacakravartī bhaviṣyati |
S08n659:34: sarvakālaṃ sarvabuddhānāṃ ca śāsanāntarddhānakālasamaye buddho'yaṃ bhagavāṃ sattvārthaṃ kariṣyati |
S08n659:42: yathā hi buddhānāṃ śarīrā pravṛttā dhātavo jane ||
S08n659:50: sa viśvarūpī sarvajñaḥ dṛśyate ha mahītale ||
S08n659:52: eṣa saṃkṣepato mantraḥ japto'yaṃ vidhinā svayam ||
S08n659:53: karoti sarvakarmaṃ vai īpsitāṃ saphalāṃ sadā |
S08n659:54: asya kalpaṃ samāsena punaḥ kāle pracakṣyate ||
S08n659:55: yugānte munivare loke astaṃ yāte tathāgate |
S08n659:57: atha bhagavataścakravartinastathāgatoṣṇīṣasya parakarmaprayogavidhvaṃsanakarasyājitaṃjayasya sarvamantrādhipateḥ sarvabuddhabodhisattvānunītasyoṣṇīṣacakravartinaḥ saṃkṣepataḥ kalpamekākṣarasya pravartitapūrvaṃ vistarataḥ ||
S08n659:59: tasmiṃ sthāne pathe yojanābhyantareṇa sarvaduṣṭagrahāḥ prapalāyanti,
S08n659:64: svayaṃ vidyācchedaṃ karttukāmaḥ kuśānāṃ haritānāṃ muṣṭiṃ gṛhītvā,
S08n659:100: dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ tilānāmaṣṭaśataṃ juhuyāt trisandhyaṃ saptāhaṃ yaṃ mantramuddiśya,
S08n659:103: pratyādeśaṃ vā prayacchāmi devā vaśīkarttukāmaḥ devadārusamidhānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt,
S08n659:107: yakṣāṃ vaśīkarttukāmo dadhibhaktaṃ juhuyād vaśyā bhavanti |
S08n659:110: aśokapriyaṅgusamidbhiḥ kusumairvā yakṣiṇīnāgināgagrahāṇāṃ rājikābhiḥ rājānasiddhārthakaiḥ brahmāṇaṃ puṣpahomena,
S08n659:116: sarvān ghṛītatailahomena vaśyāṃ karoti sarvatra trisandhyaṃ saptarātram |
S08n659:122: eṣa kalpo mayā proktaḥ ekadeśo hi cakriṇe |
S08n659:124: kalpairyasya pramāṇaṃ tu na śakyaṃ bhāṣituṃ jinaiḥ |
S08n659:129: naṣṭe kāle yugānte vai mānuṣāṇāṃ sukhodayam ||
